fn.p: Competing Interests: This paper was financed by Brazilian Agricultural Research Corporation (EMBRAPA), Embrapa Dairy Cattle for funding this research and providing its facilities, and Adisseo Company for funding this research (project number: 20500.18/0005-2). Conselho Nacional de Desenvolvimento Científico e Tecnológico (CNPq, Brasília, Brazil), Instituto Nacional de Ciência e Tecnologia Ciência Animal (INCT, Viçosa, Brazil) for granting the scholarship. Alessandra L. Voorsluys and David V. Jacob received salary from Adisseo Company. There are no patents, products in development or marketed products to declare. This does not alter our adherence to PLOS ONE policies on sharing data and materials.
‡ These authors also contributed equally to this work.
